profile.name: Akshita Mary John
profile.title: Professional Developer
profile.bio: Product Analyst with 3 years' experience aligning AI-powered SaaS features to client needs and delivering actionable product insights. Strong SQL background, proven impact on data-driven product decisions, and expertise in analytics tools including Power BI.
